description:
Know before you build. Knowing the principles of distributed systems is the first step in building any large cloud based system. Learn the principles, lessons learned, what to be on the lookout for and advice on building your own system. This session will also discuss how to take advantage of consistent hashing with partitioning, eventual consistency and operations in an environment where hardware fails every day.

Sponsored by The Rackspace Cloud
title: How to Build a Large, Distributed System to Operate at Scale
